Another Real Madrid player heads the ball to the Real Madrid player wearing the number 17 jersey. At this point, a Juventus player attempts to defend, causing the Real Madrid player wearing number 17 to fall to the ground. The camera then goes into slow motion, showing the Juventus player kicking the Real Madrid player wearing number 17 with his right foot, resulting in the goalkeeper easily catching the ball. The scene then switches to another angle, replaying the incident.
